# Supply Chain Security Alert: NPM Package Compromise

## Incident Overview
This week, security researchers identified a sophisticated supply chain attack targeting popular NPM packages used in enterprise applications.

## Attack Methodology
- Package typosquatting
- Dependency confusion
- Malicious code injection

## Detection and Prevention
- Package verification techniques
- Dependency scanning tools
- Security policies for package management

*Part of our weekly security update series covering current threats and vulnerabilities.*
